# isVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the picker dialog is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
var isVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Displaying the Picker Dialog

- **dismiss()**: Hides the peer picker dialog.
- **show()**: Displays the peer picker dialog to the user.

items.description: Displays the peer picker dialog to the user.
